playlist.title: Tulsa Times
playlist.creator: OETA
playlist.annotation: OETA's weekly roundup of news and culture covering the Northeast part of the state. This program is currently on hiatus.

track.title: Tulsa Times 09-26-2009
track.ov:subtitle: Oklahoma Music Hall of Fame
track.annotation: This 30-minute news magazine program dedicated the entire show to the Oklahoma Music Hall of Fame induction ceremony and concert. Newcomer country-music star, Carrie Underwood lit up the stage as she performed after being inducted into the Oklahoma Music Hall of Fame. Joining her in the induction ceremony and concert were Rocky Frisco and Ramona Reed. The program also gave a behind-the-scenes look at a news conference that was held before the event with the three inductees. One of Underwoodâ€™s former music instructors was also there. It was hosted by Angela Rosecrans from the Oklahoma Music Hall of Fame and Museum in Muskogee.

track.title: From Silence to Sound
track.annotation: a story by Cathy Tatom and Edwin Wilson on OETA's ONR.
